name: get_subcontrol_by_control
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool risk_management_framework.
Tool description: The Risk Management Framework (RMF) makes it easy to view and compare controls and CCIs.
API description: This endpoint will return all the subcontrols/ccis owned by a control such as AC-1. In the case of AC-1, this endpoint will return AC-1.1, AC-1.2, etc.

control.description: The identifier of the control (e.g., "AC-1") for which subcontrols or CCIs are to be fetched.
